overview: Duleepa has been working with Internet-related stuff since 1993 and has experienced the joy and frustrations of leading and developing large-scale databases and applications accessed by millions of users, including game-related properties at BioWare Corp. (now a division of Electronic Arts). Before founding Empire Avenue, Duleepa was the Community Relations Manager in North America for Sun Microsystems/MySQL and has been seen travelling coast-to-coast talking to universities, technical groups and conferences, trying to social network the old-fashioned way.
